pullRequest.title: wappalyzer: Add technology descriptions to tooltip/API output
pullRequest.bodyText:
Application > Add description field, getter and setter.
TechPanel > Add handling for getting the tooltip based on the description.
WappalyzerAPI > Include the description in detailed API output.
WappalyzerJsonParser > Set the description when available.
CHANGELOG > Add a change note.

Ex (my cursor isn't showing but it is on the second row):

Signed-off-by: kingthorin kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com

nodes.bodyText: If empty string is returned then a weird blank box is shown (in dark mode anyway).

commit.message:

description.

beforeCommit.message:
Add WappalyzerJsonParser UnitTest

- apps.json > A stripped down version of the input file with a single
entry to facilitate testing.
- WappalyzerJsonParser > Add new utility method for parsing a file with
agiven path.
- WappalyzerJsonParserUnitTest > The new UnitTest class.

Signed-off-by: kingthorin <kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com>
